--0-1794131598-1061550079=:64586 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit Hello, I'm currently developing a research project about the lighting behaviour of membrane or fabric structures. I intend to model some prototypes in Radiance, therefore I would like to know if there is someone who has used Radiance to model fabric membrane buildings. I will appreciate any help! Thanks, Julia Mundo. PhD student. School of the Built Environment The University of Nottingham. Nottingham, UK. NG7 2RD e-mail: laxjjm@nottingham.ac.uk Want to chat instantly with your online friends? Get the FREE Yahoo!Messenger --0-1794131598-1061550079=:64586 Content-Type: text/html; charset=iso-8859-1 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit
Hello,
I'm currently developing a research project about the lighting behaviour of membrane or fabric structures. I intend to model some prototypes in Radiance, therefore I would like to know if there is someone who has used Radiance to model fabric membrane buildings.
 
I will appreciate any help!
Thanks,
Julia Mundo.
 
PhD student.
School of the Built Environment
The University of Nottingham.
Nottingham, UK.
NG7 2RD
e-mail: laxjjm@nottingham.ac.uk
